## polyBLEP variable

Polynomial attenuation to create bandlimited version of a signal.

- [http://research.spa.aalto.fi/publications/papers/smc2010-phaseshaping/](http://research.spa.aalto.fi/publications/papers/smc2010-phaseshaping/) - [http://www.kvraudio.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=375517](http://www.kvraudio.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=375517)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polyBLEP: (eps: number, x: number) => number
```
